full_text: Page 2395 Thanks, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Public Information Office Federal Bureau of Prisons (202) 353 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) > (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usatoday.com> 10/22/2019 10:32 AM >> Good morning, In wake of the Epstein death, I understand that institutions across the bureau are designating specific officers to regularly monitor surveillance video in segregated housing units and other locations where inmates are at some risk for suicide. Is there someone who may be able to elaborate on this effort? Many thanks, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) USA TODAY 703-854 703-472 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Page 14415 DOJ-OGR-00026072

text_blocks.content: Public Information Office Federal Bureau of Prisons (202) 353

In wake of the Epstein death, I understand that institutions across the bureau are designating specific officers to regularly monitor surveillance video in segregated housing units and other locations where inmates are at some risk for suicide.
Is there someone who may be able to elaborate on this effort?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a redacted email chain. Multiple names and contact information have been redacted using (b)(6); (b)(7)(C).
